title: Shopify App Store Scraper & Intelligence Engine â€” Input
description: Choose which Shopify categories to scrape and how many items per category.

headless.title: Headless (forced on Apify)
headless.description: On the Apify platform, headless is always forced to true (no GUI display is available).

shopify.title: Shopify config
shopify.description: Select categories and configure Shopify scraping.

nav_config_path.title: Nav config path
nav_config_path.description: Path to the navigation config JSON inside the Actor (usually keep default).

selected_categories.title: Categories to scrape (by number)
selected_categories.description:
Enter category numbers from the list below. If you leave this empty, the Actor will scrape the FIRST maxCategories categories.

Category list:
1) Sales channels
2) Selling products apps
3) Store design apps
4) Store management apps
5) Finding products apps
6) Orders and shipping apps
7) Marketing and conversion apps

products_per_category.title: Products/apps per category
products_per_category.description: Maximum number of products/apps to collect from each category page.

maxCategories.title: Max categories (quantity cap)
maxCategories.description:
Maximum number of categories to scrape in this run. Example: 3 means only 3 categories will be processed.
Tip: If selected_categories has more than this number, only the first maxCategories will be used.
Set 0 for no limit (not recommended).

max_categories.title: Max categories (legacy key)
max_categories.description: Legacy alias for maxCategories. Keep empty unless you need backward compatibility.

products_per_category.title: Products per category (legacy/alias)
products_per_category.description: Optional alias. Prefer Shopify config: shopify.products_per_category.

max_apps_total.title: Max apps total
max_apps_total.description: Stop after this many total apps across all categories (0 = no limit).

exportCsv.title: Export CSV
exportCsv.description: Write CSV to the Key-Value Store.

exportXlsx.title: Export XLSX
exportXlsx.description: Write XLSX to the Key-Value Store.
